title: Michael Serr
text: Michael Serr (born July 14, 1962) is a German retired <a href="association%20football">football</a> player. He spent 7 seasons in the <a href="Fu%C3%9Fball-Bundesliga">Bundesliga</a> with <a href="1.%20FC%20Kaiserslautern">1. FC Kaiserslautern</a>. As of February 2009, he was working as a <a href="sports%20agent">player agent</a>.
